JobFullDesc: CSA Manager Job DescriptionThe global VMware Professional Services (PS) Organization drives and influences the success of each VMware implementation. As a customer centric organization, the PS team is dedicated to the success of our customers and their digital strategies. We ensure our customers are successfully implementing and delivering against their business plans from adoption all the way to a fully functioning solution that meets their defined business outcomes.As a PS Client Solutions Architect (CSA) Manager, you will be responsible for assisting with the PS design and scoping of services of outcome focussed solutions for our customers while leading a team of CSAs. The role will require you to understand the products, frameworks, and design patterns used for VMware solutions while leading and mentoring other CSAs in their development.  To effectively build solutions that solve for business problems it will be important to develop a strong network among your peers and internal and external teams. You should already be well versed in pre-sales initiatives and programs to aid in delivering of our solutions and possess a good mix of Technical Skills, basic Business Acumen, and a strong bias for customer centricity. You will be acting as a both a manager and pre-sales technologist and should be prepared to quickly develop a broad understanding of VMware and related technologies.
